page.title: 06ST.PETERS SCHOOLS
page.content: {Nursery School.}Morning attendance 30, 28 in the afternoon. Children start when rising 4, pass onto our school or neighbouring schools when 5. { {Infants}3 vertical groups sharing working space. Each teacher has a home base. {Junior School}every child learns to swim before leaving. Cafeteria style lunches. We have recorders and a choir. The new St.Peters School was built in 1975. The old school is now an art annexe. { {Annexe}hours 9.30am. to 9.30pm. Design and associated industries. 160 people studying there by September,1985. Students entering must be 16 years old with 3 G.C.E.'O' levels,grades A,B or C. No full time grants available. Fees, student union fee Â£20, college fee Â£21 a term. An average of Â£4 a week is required for materials and instruments.
